name: UP03 MarsMarine (In Progress)
description:
Welcome to the "Udemy Project" Mars Marine.

It's a third project from GameDev.Tv Unreal Blueprints course. This project is part of my own big series "UP" where I decided to make and finish small game projects.

The goals that I set for myself:
  1. Create prototype like Mars Marine from GameDev.tv course
  2. Use Unreal Engine 4 (4.27.1) and Blueprints ONLY
  3. Use Plugins
  4. Learn more about Blueprints and Unreal Editor
  5. Practice with level design, game design
  6. Draw Concept Art
  7. Make 3d assets, learn 3d pipelines
  8. Create Intro in Sequencer
  9. Try to use Niagara VFX
  10. Add music and sound fx
  11. Play top down shooters
  12. Write a story
  13. Learn about Space, Planets and Universe
  14. FINISH THIS PROJECT
